sec.p: The datasets generated and analysed during the current study are included in the main manuscript or additional supporting files. The genomic sequences generated have been submitted to the European Nucleotide Archive as part of project PRJEB27962. Release date 30-Dec-2019, unless the data are published before. Putative VRN1 regulatory elements are annotated in http://floresta.eead.csic.es/footprintdb/index.php?motif=VRN1&db=EEADannot. All the data are available from the corresponding author on reasonable request.
